main event: A witness reported seeing a light moving across the sky in Bay City, Michigan on May 25, 1964.
interesting points: The light was observed moving from west to east while making no noise,The brightness was noted to be half that of Jupiter,The object appeared to waver in flight,The witness possessed a small telescope but did not use it to observe the object,Investigation concluded it was likely the Echo I satellite.
sighted object: a light moving in the sky
